about_the_game:
The progressive synth metal soundtrack to the retro FPS: Impaler Gold.

Composed by Catton Arthur, the Impaler Gold soundtrack includes remasters of the game’s music by engineer Keegan Ostrowski and a new 10 minute prog rock epic: Empire of Time: The Builder, featuring real guitar and bass performed by the composer.
detailed_description:
The progressive synth metal soundtrack to the retro FPS: Impaler Gold.

Composed by Catton Arthur, the Impaler Gold soundtrack includes remasters of the game’s music by engineer Keegan Ostrowski and a new 10 minute prog rock epic: Empire of Time: The Builder, featuring real guitar and bass performed by the composer.
